en: She looks a lot like her mother.
She is not anything like her mother.
She is very much like her mother.
She is a reflection of her mother.
zh: 她简直就是她妈的翻版。

en: She is as beautiful as her mother.
She came in company with her mother.
She assisted her mother in caring for the baby.
She accompanied her mother as she bought shoes.
She prayed that her mother would forgive her.
She hungered for a sight of her mother.
She rested her head on her mother's shoulder.
She shined the knives and forks for Mother.
zh: 她帮妈妈把刀叉擦得亮晶晶的。

en: She made my mother take care of the baby.
She had my mother take care of the baby.
She made her mother happy.
She walks.
She has a comfortable income to live on.
zh: 她的收入挺丰厚的，够花了。

en: She walked and talked.
She talked as she walked.
She sang as she walked.
She was seen to walk out of the room.
zh: 有人看见她走出了房间。

en: She goes to school on foot.
She need not have brought a lunch.
She announced her engagement to her lawyer friend.
zh: 她宣布了要和她那个律师朋友订婚。

en: She was admitted to the bar.
zh: 她拿到了律师执业资格。

en: She is bent on becoming a lawyer.
Soon after she became a lawyer, she wouldn't even give her old friends the time of day.
zh: 她一当上律师，连老朋友都不理了。

en: She conferred with her lawyer.
zh: 她和她的律师商量了一下。

en: I think she will succeed as a lawyer.
zh: 我觉得她能当个好律师。

en: She went out of her study.
Her work in school warranted her good grades.
zh: 她在学校的表现配得上她的好成绩。

en: She's far behind in her studies.
zh: 她的功课落下了一大截。

en: She was at a loss for an answer.
She didn't reply.
She made no reply.
She looked all around.
She put her knitting aside and stood up.
zh: 她放下手里织的活儿站了起来。

en: She is made to be an editor.
zh: 她天生就是当编辑的料。

en: She is absorbed in knitting.
She is really into knitting.
She was busy knitting. In the meantime, he was taking a nap by the fire.
zh: 她忙着织毛衣，而他则在火炉旁打盹。

en: Her dream is to lead a life full of variety.
zh: 她的梦想是过上丰富多彩的生活。

en: She walked away without saying good bye.
She painted the walls white.
She decorated the wall with pictures.
zh: 她在墙上挂了些画做装饰。

en: She stained the wall beige.
She painted the wall pink.
She is just a wallflower.
She will specialize in American history.
She'll major in American history.
She was educated in the United States.
She is remarkably attractive.
She walked on her hands along the top of the wall.
She was able to answer whatever was asked.
zh: 无论问什么，她都能答上来。

en: She lives by her pen.
She is a good writer.
She is a perfect dream.
She went to Italy in order to study literature.
zh: 她去意大利是为了学文学。

en: She went to Italy to study literature.
She gave her entire life to the study of physics.
zh: 她把一生都献给了物理研究。

en: She devoted her entire life to the study of physics.
zh: 她把一辈子都投入到了物理研究中。

en: She came across some old documents in the closet.
zh: 她在衣柜里翻出了一些旧文件。

en: She was walking to and fro, lost in thought.
zh: 她在那儿走来走去，陷入了沉思。

en: She has a broad view of things.
zh: 她看问题的眼界很开阔。

en: She broke off her engagement in a fit of anger.
zh: 她一气之下把婚给退了。

en: She lost her temper and shouted at me.
zh: 她冲我大发雷霆，还大喊大叫。

en: She cares a lot about clothes.
She is particular about what she wears.
She spends most of her money on her dresses.
zh: 她的大部分钱都花在买裙子上了。

en: She spends most of her money on clothes.
zh: 她的大部分钱都花在买衣服上了。

en: She doesn't care about her dress.
She is careless about dress.
zh: 她对穿衣打扮挺随意的。

en: She is careless about the way she dresses.
zh: 她对自己的穿着不怎么上心。

en: She doesn't pay much attention to how she dresses.
zh: 她不怎么注重自己的打扮。

en: She doesn't care how she dresses.
zh: 她不在乎自己穿成什么样。

en: She is sewing a dress.
She put away her clothes.
She slipped into her clothes.
She went into her room to change her dress.
She is particular about her dress.
zh: 她对自己的穿着打扮很讲究。

en: She is wearing accessories.
She was ironing her dress.
She went out of the room with downcast eyes.
She was looking for a room with a bath, and found one near here.
zh: 她想找个带浴室的房间，就在这附近找到了一个。

en: She pricked the balloon.
She said she had a slight cold.
She was subject to cold.
She caught colds often.
She was susceptible to colds.
She wore such thin clothes that she might well catch a cold.
zh: 她穿得那么单薄，肯定得感冒。

en: She is in bed with a cold.
zh: 她感冒了，在床上躺着呢。

en: She was absent due to a cold.
She said she had a cold.
She has a cold and is absent from school.
She was absent simply because she caught cold.
zh: 她没来仅仅是因为感冒了。

en: She is down with a cold.
She was absent from school with a cold.
She opened the window to let in fresh air.
She ran up to me, her hair flying in the wind.
zh: 她朝我跑了过来，长发在风中飘动。

en: She was absent from the club activities.
She reserved a room.
She breaks something every time she cleans the room.
zh: 她每次收拾屋子都要弄坏点东西。

en: She cleaned the room.
She cleaned the room, and ran errands.
zh: 她收拾了屋子，还去办了点事。

en: She began to cry as soon as she left the room.
She went out of the room.
She looked around the room.
She always keeps her room neat and tidy.
zh: 她总是把屋子收拾得利利索索的。

en: She removed her hat when she entered the room.
zh: 她进屋的时候把帽子摘了。

en: She kept walking about the room. She seemed too uneasy to sit still.
zh: 她在屋里不停地转悠，显得心神不宁的，根本坐不住。

en: She kept walking about the room.
zh: 她一直在屋里走来走去。

en: She closed all the windows in the room.
zh: 她把屋里的窗户全关上了。

en: She shut herself up in her room.
She was locked up in a room.
She furnished the room with beautiful furniture.
zh: 她给屋里添了不少漂亮的家具。

en: She burst into the room.
She went into the room and lay on the bed.
She came into the room.
She opened the window so as to let the fresh air into the room.
zh: 她开了窗户好让新鲜空气进来。

en: She installed a new electric stove in the room.
zh: 她在屋里装了个新电炉。

en: She was left alone in the room.
She was alone in this opinion.
zh: 只有她一个人是这个想法。

en: She complained of the room being too hot.
She came out of the room.
She smarted from the insult.
zh: 受了侮辱让她心里特别难受。

en: She takes after her father.
She was very proud of her father.
She attempted to persuade her father.
She's going to talk her father into buying a new car.
zh: 她打算磨磨她爸，让他买辆新车。

en: She kissed her father on the cheek.
zh: 她在她爸脸上亲了一口。

en: She succeeded to her father's whole estate.
zh: 她继承了她爸所有的家产。

en: She couldn't make the admission that she had broken her father's watch.
zh: 她不敢承认自己弄坏了她爸的手表。

en: She took no notice of what her father said.
zh: 她根本没理会她爸说的话。

en: She is anxious about her father's health.
She wanted to have her father's love to herself.
She cried at the sight of her father's dead body.
zh: 一看到她爸的遗体，她就哭了。

en: She was clinging to her father.
She knitted her father a sweater.
She walked arm in arm with her father.
zh: 她挽着她爸的胳膊走着。

en: She cared for her father until his death.
zh: 她一直照顾她爸直到他去世。

en: She is proud of her father being rich.
zh: 她挺以她爸有钱为荣的。

en: She knows the news better than her father.
zh: 她知道的消息比她爸还灵通。

en: She helped her father with the work in the garden.
zh: 她帮她爸干花园里的活。

en: She got over the shock of her father's death.
zh: 她总算从她爸去世的打击中缓过来了。

en: She was filled with deep grief to hear of her father's sudden death.
zh: 听说她爸突然走了，她悲痛欲绝。

en: She got married against her father's will.
zh: 她不顾她爸的反对结了婚。

en: She was in a hurry to see her father.
She phoned her husband to come immediately.
zh: 她给她老公打电话让他赶紧过来。

en: She got a pair of shoes from Father.
zh: 她从她爸那儿得了一双鞋。

en: She is a loose woman and will honestly go with anyone.
zh: 她这人很随便，跟谁都能搞在一起。

en: She looked at a floating cloud.
zh: 她看着天上一朵飘着的云。

en: She usually goes to bed at nine.
She is wearing a long face.
In general, she is an early riser.
She usually gets up early.
She usually sleeps for eight hours.
She frowned him into silence.
zh: 她一皱眉，他就吓得不敢说话了。

en: Her stern look got him to quit talking.
zh: 她那严厉的眼神让他不敢再吭声了。

en: She is not afraid of anything.
She will get married to a rich man.
She is seeking wealth.
She took an active part in the women's lib movement.
zh: 她积极参加了妇女解放运动。

en: She is devoted to her husband.
She played a part in the women's lib movement.
zh: 她参与了妇女解放运动。

en: She dominates her husband.
zh: 她把她老公管得死死的。

en: She employed a private detective to keep a watch on her husband.
zh: 她请了个私家侦探盯着她老公。

en: She was down on her husband.
She hated her husband.
She didn't like her husband.
She disliked her husband.
She will love her husband for good.
She'll love her husband forever.
She praised her husband to excess.
She went on trial charged with murdering her husband.
zh: 她因涉嫌谋杀亲夫而受审。

en: She has him at her beck and call.
She made fun of her husband.
She survived her husband by ten years.
zh: 她比她丈夫多活了十年。

en: She brushed her husband's hat.
zh: 她帮她老公刷了刷帽子。

en: Her husband's illness caused her great anxiety.
zh: 她老公的病让她非常焦虑。

en: She earns half as much money as her husband.
zh: 她挣的钱只有她老公的一半。

en: She was in doubt about the ability of her husband.
She longs for her husband to arrive.
She threw her arms around her husband's neck.
zh: 她搂住了她老公的脖子。

en: She knows her husband's psychology.
zh: 她很了解她老公的心理。

en: She did nothing but grieve over her husband's death.
zh: 她整天只顾着为丈夫的死而伤心。

en: She is grieved at her husband's death.
zh: 她为丈夫的去世感到很悲痛。

en: She was quite unaffected by the death of her husband.
zh: 她对丈夫的死一点反应都没有。

en: She cherishes the memory of her husband.
She helped her husband with his work.
She is always finding fault with her husband.
zh: 她老是挑她老公的毛病。

en: She yearned for her husband to come home.
zh: 她渴望她老公赶快回家。

en: She waited eagerly for her husband's return.
zh: 她急切地盼着她老公回来。

en: She stood close to her husband.
She entrusted her husband with a letter.
She had her husband drive the children to their homes.
zh: 她让她老公开车送孩子们回家。

en: She was scared to death of her husband.
She cooked her husband an apple pie.
zh: 她给她老公做了个苹果派。

en: She made her husband an apple pie.
zh: 她给她老公做了一个苹果派。

en: She baked her husband an apple pie.
zh: 她给她老公烤了一个苹果派。

en: She divorced her husband.
She has legally divorced her husband.
zh: 她跟她老公已经办完离婚手续了。

en: She shared her husband's fate.
She got so carried away when arguing with her husband that she burst into tears.
zh: 她跟老公吵架时太激动了，一下就哭了出来。

en: She had been in the hospital for a week before her husband came back.
zh: 她老公回来之前，她已经在医院住了一个星期。

en: She was thankful that her husband had returned safe.
zh: 她老公平安回来了，她感到很庆幸。

en: She was in despair when her husband died.
zh: 她老公去世时，她感到很绝望。

en: She couldn't accept that her husband died.
zh: 她没法接受她老公已经去世了。

en: She didn't like her husband drunk.
zh: 她不喜欢她老公喝醉的样子。

en: She got her back up when her husband came home drunk.
zh: 她老公喝醉酒回家时，她火冒三丈。

en: She perceived that her husband was unhappy.
zh: 她察觉到她老公不开心。

en: She stood by her husband whenever he was in trouble.
zh: 每当她老公遇到麻烦，她都会支持他。

en: She is proud of her husband being rich.
She was on edge till she heard from her husband.
zh: 在收到她老公的消息之前，她一直提心吊胆。

en: She bore up well under unfavorable circumstances.
If she was displeased, she never showed it.
zh: 就算她不高兴，也从来没表现出来。

en: She was relieved from insomnia.
She threw a disapproving glance at me.
She did it against her will.
zh: 她是违心地做了这件事。

en: She began to grumble and then to weep.
zh: 她先是抱怨，然后就哭了起来。

en: She does nothing but complain.
zh: 她除了抱怨什么也不干。

en: She is an estate agent.
She was punished for careless driving.
zh: 她因为开车太粗心被罚了。

en: She has spoiled her work by being careless.
zh: 她因为太粗心，把事情给搞砸了。

en: Confused by her careless mistake, she burst into tears.
zh: 她被自己犯的低级错误搞懵了，一下子哭了出来。

en: She looked around in wonder.
zh: 她满脸惊讶地环顾四周。

en: She seems to be unhappy.
She lived an unhappy life.
She is living an unhappy life.
She was in a bad temper.
She is awkward.
zh: 她这人有点笨手笨脚的。

en: She got sick of the ugly animals.
zh: 她看腻了那些长得丑的动物。

en: Her anxiety almost drove her wild.
zh: 焦虑简直要把她逼疯了。

en: She poured some milk from the bottle.
zh: 她从瓶里倒了点牛奶出来。

en: She gave some food to the poor family.
zh: 她给那户穷人家送了点吃的。

en: Poor as she was, she gave him what little money she had.
zh: 虽然她很穷，但还是把仅有的一点钱都给了他。

en: She is a friend of the poor.
She devoted her life to working among the poor.
zh: 她把一生都献给了救助穷人的事业。

en: She lives in poor circumstances.
She is poor, but she is happy.
Although she is poor, she is satisfied.
zh: 虽然她很穷，但她很知足。

en: She is poor, but happy.
zh: 她虽然穷，但过得很开心。

en: She was still weak after her illness.
zh: 病好后她身体还是很虚弱。

en: She resigned on the grounds of ill health.
zh: 她以身体不好为由辞职了。

en: She cares for her sick mother.
She is attending on her sick mother.
She cared for her sick mother.
She cared for her sick father.
She went in search of a doctor for her sick baby.
zh: 她去给生病的孩子找医生了。

en: She made believe that she was sick.
She attended on her sick husband.
She kept an all-night vigil over her sick child.
zh: 她守了生病的孩子一整夜。

en: She seems to be sick.
She could not come on account of illness.
She was absent from school owing to sickness.
She could not come because she was ill.
zh: 她因为病了，所以没能来。

en: She was absent from school because of sickness.
She was absent from school because she was sick.
zh: 她生病了，所以没去上学。

en: She cannot attend school on account of illness.
zh: 她因为生病不能去学校。

en: She must be sick.
She fell ill, but got well soon.
I am afraid she is ill.
She must be ill in bed.
zh: 她肯定病得躺在床上呢。

en: It is said that she is ill in bed.
She has been sick in bed for some time.
zh: 她已经病在床上好一段时间了。

en: After her sickness, she's only a shadow of her former self.
zh: 大病之后，她整个人都憔悴得不像样了。

en: She is absent because of sickness.
She's absent because she's sick.
She lies ill in bed.
She looked as if she had been sick in bed for years.
zh: 她看上去就像病了好几年似的。

en: She cannot have been ill.
Her illness prevented her from attending the party.
zh: 她因为生病没能参加聚会。

en: Her illness kept her from attending the party.
zh: 生病让她没法参加派对。

en: She pretended that she was sick.
Her illness kept her in hospital for six weeks.
zh: 她因为生病在医院住了六个星期。

en: Her illness kept her in the hospital for six weeks.
zh: 她的病让她在医院住了六周。

en: She was in the hospital for six weeks because she was sick.
zh: 她因为生病在医院住了六个礼拜。

en: She was in the hospital for six weeks because of her illness.
zh: 因为生病，她在医院住了六个星期。

en: She has been sick in bed for a week.
zh: 她已经卧床病了一个星期了。

en: I think she is sick. She has a temperature.
zh: 我觉得她病了，她在发烧。

en: It is said that she is ill.
She said that she was ill, which was a lie.
zh: 她说她病了，其实是在撒谎。

en: She said that she was ill.
It seems that she was ill.
She seemed to have been ill.
zh: 她看起来像是病了一场。

en: She was sick, so she couldn't come.
She seems to have been ill.
She was anxious to recover from illness.
It took her four months to recover from her sickness.
zh: 她的病花了四个月才好。

en: She has got over her illness.
She took a taxi to the hospital.
She went to the hospital by taxi.
She insisted that he should go to the hospital.
She came to herself when she was taken to the hospital.
zh: 她被送到医院的时候醒过来了。

en: She was being carried to the hospital.
She works for a hospital.
She was looked after in the hospital.
She came to her senses in hospital.
She regained consciousness in the hospital.
She had the book with a torn cover under her arm.
zh: 她胳肢窝下夹着那本封面破了的书。

en: She is likely to live to be one hundred.
zh: 她很有可能活到一百岁。

en: She is a poor correspondent.
She demanded one above the necessity.
zh: 她要的比实际需要的还多。

en: She told a white lie out of necessity.
zh: 她出于无奈说了一个善意的谎言。

en: She ran for dear life.
She made a point of visiting me.
She is not always happy.
She practices playing the piano regularly.
She did not answer all the questions.
zh: 她没有回答所有的问题。

en: She felt her knees tremble.
She went to the hairdresser's.
She runs a beauty shop.
She uses her looks.
She has beauty as a point in her favour.
She has the advantage of beauty.
She has a feel for beauty.
She is lacking in sense of beauty.
She is more clever than beautiful.
zh: 她与其说漂亮，不如说聪明。

en: She is beautiful, intelligent and, what is best of all, very kind-hearted.
zh: 她既漂亮又聪明，最难得的是人还特别善良。

en: She has beauty and what passes for intelligence.
zh: 她有美貌，还有所谓的聪明才智。

en: She is not only beautiful but also amiable.
zh: 她不仅长得漂亮，还很随和。

en: She's a beauty from a distance.
She is said to have been beautiful.
She plans to take part in the beauty contest.
She participated in the beauty contest.
She went to France in order to study art.
zh: 她去法国是为了学艺术。

en: She went to France for the purpose of studying art.
zh: 她去法国的目的是学艺术。

en: She has an eye for the beautiful.
She has an eye for beauty.
She has no sense of the beautiful.
She has no sense of beauty.
She is vain of her beauty.
zh: 她对自己的美貌很自负。

en: She is endowed with beauty.
She surpasses her sister in beauty.
zh: 她比她姐姐长得还漂亮。

en: She must have been very beautiful.
zh: 她以前一定长得很漂亮。

en: She has a beautiful voice.
She sang with a beautiful voice.
She is proud of being beautiful.
zh: 她为自己的美貌感到自豪。

en: She has some beautiful antique furniture.
zh: 她有一些很漂亮的古董家具。

en: Besides being beautiful, she is kind and intellectual.
zh: 除了漂亮，她还很善良，有才华。

en: She picked a lot of beautiful flowers.
She was not merely beautiful, but also talented.
zh: 她不仅长得美，还很有才华。

en: She is more pretty than beautiful.
zh: 她与其说漂亮，不如说清秀。

en: She got a beautiful dress on.
zh: 她穿着一件很漂亮的裙子。

en: She wore a beautiful dress.
zh: 她穿了一件漂亮的裙子。

en: She is handsome rather than beautiful.
zh: 她与其说漂亮，不如说帅气。

en: She is not merely beautiful but bright.
She is not only beautiful but also intelligent.
She is not only beautiful but also kind to everybody.
zh: 她不仅长得美，对大家也都很好。

en: She is popular not because she is beautiful, but because she is kind to everyone.
zh: 她受欢迎不是因为漂亮，而是因为她对每个人都很友善。

en: She's popular, not because she's beautiful, but because she's kind to everyone.
zh: 她人缘好，不是因为长得美，而是因为她对谁都特别好。

en: She is beautiful, and what is more, very graceful.
zh: 她长得漂亮，而且很有气质。

en: She is a beauty.
She greeted me with a smile.
zh: 她微笑着跟我打了个招呼。

en: She smiled me into good humor.
zh: 她的微笑让我心情好了起来。

en: She smiled and said goodbye.
She took the punishment with a smile.
She spoke to me with a smile.
She said with a smile.
She cried for joy when she heard that her son had survived the plane crash.
zh: 听说儿子在空难中幸存了，她喜极而泣。

en: She was an orphan who lost her parents in a plane crash.
zh: 她是个在空难中失去双亲的孤儿。

en: She died in a plane crash.
zh: 她在一场空难中去世了。

en: She waved at me before she got on board the plane.
zh: 她上飞机前朝我挥了挥手。

en: She had an unfriendly attitude.
She was moody.
She has an extraordinary ability in music.
zh: 她在音乐方面非常有天赋。

en: She sought forgiveness for her guilty acts.
zh: 她为自己的过错寻求原谅。

en: She put by some money for a rainy day.
zh: 她攒了些钱以备不时之需。

en: She put some money away for a rainy day.
She is as busy as a bee.
She is very busy.
She looks very afraid.
She was such a beautiful girl that everybody turned to look at her as she passed.
zh: 她长得太漂亮了，走在路上回头率特别高。

en: She is very intelligent.
She felt so humiliated that she couldn't say anything.
zh: 她觉得太受羞辱了，一句话也说不出来。

en: She is very nervous and is always ill at ease.
zh: 她很紧张，总是局促不安。

en: She is a very refined lady.
zh: 她是个非常有涵养的女士。

en: She has a very strong personality.
She is not so foolish that she does not know it.
zh: 她没那么笨，肯定知道这事。

en: She was quite eager in her studies.
Her surprise was so great that she could not speak.
Such was her delight that she began to dance.
She contributed much to the company.
She looks very much afraid.
She decorated her house regardless of cost.
zh: 她不计成本地装修了房子。

en: She wants to lose weight because she is overweight.
zh: 她想减肥，因为她超重了。

en: She admits knowing the secret.
She was reluctant to reveal her secret.
zh: 她不太愿意透露她的秘密。

en: She was burning to tell the secret.
zh: 她急着想把秘密说出来。

en: She really wanted to tell the secret.
zh: 她真的很想把秘密说出来。

en: She is apt to keep a secret to herself.
zh: 她这人挺能守得住秘密的。

en: She keeps secrets.
She let the secret out.
She did not let me into her secret.
She didn't let me in on her secret.
zh: 她没让我知道她的秘密。

en: She didn't tell me her secret.
She made up her mind to be a secretary.
zh: 她下定决心要当个秘书。

en: She was trained to be a secretary.
As a secretary she is a prize.
zh: 作为一个秘书，她简直太出色了。

en: I cannot recommend her as a secretary.
She is very efficient in the secretarial work.
zh: 她的秘书工作做得非常利索。

en: She was too tired to go on working.
zh: 她太累了，没法继续干活了。

en: She flung herself upon a sofa, protesting that she was fatigued to death.
zh: 她往沙发上一躺，直嚷嚷说快累死了。

en: She does look tired.
She was worn out, and leaned against the apple tree.
zh: 她累坏了，靠在那棵苹果树上。

en: She was tired but decided on walking.
zh: 她虽然累，但还是决定走路。

en: Although she was tired, she tried to finish the work.
zh: 虽然她很累，但她还是努力把活儿干完。

en: Tired as she was, she tried to finish the work.
zh: 尽管很累，她还是坚持把工作做完。

en: She was tired. However, she tried to finish the work.
zh: 她很累，不过她还是试着把活儿干完了。

en: She was too much fatigued to speak.
zh: 她累得话都说不出来了。

en: She was too tired to speak.
She is very sensitive to criticism.
zh: 她这人特别听不得批评。

en: She is dying of grief.
She was distracted by grief.
zh: 她因为太难过，整个人都恍恍惚惚的。

en: She died a miserable death.
She has a tendency to look on the dark side of things.
She kept her sorrow in her bosom.
She spent her later life with a hidden sorrow.
zh: 她晚年心里一直藏着隐痛。

en: She abandoned herself to grief.
zh: 她整个人都沉浸在悲痛里。

en: She looked sadly at me.
She looked sad.
She wore a sad expression.
She looks sad.
Her grief was too acute for tears.
zh: 她悲痛欲绝，连眼泪都流不出来了。

en: She looks sorrowful and forlorn.
She doesn't like to sing a sad song.
She doesn't like to sing sad songs.
zh: 她不喜欢唱那些悲伤的曲子。

en: She calls her sister Mina-chan.
She is no less slender than her sister is.
She is just as charming as her sister.
zh: 她跟她姐姐一样有魅力。

en: She has to look after her mother.
She is concerned about her mother's health.
She was brought up by her grandmother.
She unburdened her heart to her friends.
zh: 她向朋友们倾诉了心事。

en: She is concerned about her health.
She called her bear Ted.
She thought of him as her lifesaver.
Him alone did she love and nobody else did she care about.
zh: 她只爱他一个人，别的人她都不在乎。

en: She ignored him, which proved unwise.
zh: 她没理他，事实证明这挺不明智的。

en: She called him by name.
She wanted to spare him embarrassment.
She flashed him her angry eyes.
He treats me like his slave.
She kept him waiting for a long time.
She described him as a detective.
zh: 她把他形容成一个侦探。

en: She mixed him up with someone else.
She thinks highly of him.
She doesn't hate him. In fact, she loves him.
zh: 她不恨他，其实她还爱着他呢。

en: She sued him for damages.
zh: 她起诉他要求赔偿损失。

en: She turned up her nose at him.
She tried in vain to please him.
zh: 她费尽心思讨好他，可一点用也没有。

en: Far from blaming him, she gave him a reward.
zh: 她非但没怪他，反而还奖励了他。

en: She denounced him to the police as a murderer.
zh: 她向警察举报他是杀人犯。

en: She needs to help him.
She gave him a good kick.
She regards him as her master.
zh: 她把他当成自己的师父。

en: She looks on him as her master.
She identified him as the murderer.
zh: 她指认他就是那个杀人犯。

en: She made him happy.
She considered him to be a blessing.
zh: 她觉得他就是上天给她的恩赐。

en: She wondered whether she should let him go or not.
zh: 她在纠结要不要放他走。

en: No sooner had she found him than she burst into tears.
zh: 她一找到他就大哭了起来。

en: The sight of him was hateful to her.
She despised him.
She felt an aversion to him.
She hated him.
She disliked him.
She didn't like him.
She regarded him as stupid.
She looks upon him as a benefactor.
zh: 她把他看作是自己的恩人。

en: She looked askance at him.
She wants to keep him at a distance.
She fell in love with him at first sight.
She made a man of him.
zh: 她把他培养成了一个真正的男人。

en: She engaged him as a programmer.
She hired him as a programmer.
She employed him as a programmer.
She described him as handsome.
She said that he was handsome.
She insisted that he be invited to the party.
zh: 她坚持要请他来参加派对。

en: She blandished him out of his black mood.
zh: 她好言好语地把他哄开心了。

en: She coaxed him out of his dark mood.
zh: 她连哄带骗地让他心情好了起来。

en: She helped him overcome his sadness.
She helped him get over his bad mood.
She cast a glance at him.
She thinks the world of him.
She kept him waiting half an hour.
Her eyes anchored on him.
zh: 她的目光锁定在他身上。

en: She abetted him in escaping from prison.
She extended a warm welcome to them.
She wanted to help them.
She said that they were good friends of hers.
zh: 她说他们是她的好朋友。

en: She was aware of their hostile feelings toward her.
zh: 她察觉到了他们对她的敌意。

en: She was gaping at their quarrel.
zh: 她目瞪口呆地看着他们吵架。

en: She endeavored to live up to their expectations.
zh: 她努力不辜负他们的期望。

en: She feels at ease in their home.
zh: 她在他们家感觉很自在。

en: She took the trouble to find a home for them.
zh: 她费心给他们找了个家。

en: She bowed in acknowledgment of their applause.
zh: 她鞠躬感谢他们的掌声。

en: She asked them to take their shoes off.
She fed them with hamburgers.
She gave them some apples.
She is hard on him.
She had a happy time with them.
zh: 她跟他们在一起玩得很开心。

en: She refused to do what they wanted.
She sang better than he.
She sang better than him.
She is a more proficient leader than he is.
zh: 她是个比他更干练的领导。

en: She's a better leader than he is.
zh: 她是个比他更好的领导。

en: She is a good deal older than he.
She's a lot older than he is.
She is five years his junior.
She's five years younger than he is.
She's five years younger than him.
She is not as tall as he.
She's not as tall as he is.
She's not as tall as him.
She said he would be back right away.
She hung on to his arm as they walked.
zh: 走路的时候，她一直挽着他的胳膊。

en: She slid into the seat next to him.
zh: 她溜进了他旁边的座位。

en: She lives next door to him.
She will make him a good wife.
She was mortified by his frank remark.
zh: 他的直言不讳让她尴尬坏了。

en: She boiled over with rage at his betrayal.
She thanked him for his helpful advice.
She rested on his promise.
She complained to me of his rudeness.
zh: 她跟我抱怨他很没礼貌。

en: She couldn't put up with his rudeness any more.
zh: 她再也受不了他的粗鲁了。

en: She could no longer put up with his insulting words.
zh: 她再也受不了他那些伤人的话了。

en: She is annoyed at his ignorance.
His ignorance causes her problems.
zh: 他的无知给她添了不少麻烦。

en: She believes that he is innocent.
She got angry at his rude behavior.
zh: 他的粗鲁行为让她很生气。

en: She couldn't do with his rude behavior.
zh: 她受不了他的粗鲁行为。

en: She reached out for his hat.
She reached out to take his hat.
She laughed at the sight of his hat.
zh: 一看到他的帽子，她就笑了。

en: She cast an eye in his direction.
His room is kept clean by her.
zh: 他的房间都是她打扫干净的。

en: She keeps his room clean.
zh: 她总是把他的房间收拾得很干净。

en: She asked after his father.
She asked about his father's condition.
zh: 她询问了他父亲的情况。

en: She asked how his father was.
zh: 她问他父亲身体怎么样。

en: She made an allusion to his misconduct.
zh: 她含沙射影地提到了他的不端行为。

en: She will perceive his irony.
She interpreted his remarks as a threat.
zh: 她把他的话当成了威胁。

en: She has as many books again as he.
She was very surprised at his sudden defiant attitude.
zh: 他突然表现出的反抗态度让她很吃惊。

en: She dropped her handkerchief on purpose to draw his attention.
zh: 她故意掉下手帕来吸引他的注意。

en: She regretted that she had not followed his advice.
She is likely to refuse to follow his advice, because she doesn't like him.
zh: 她可能不会听他的建议，因为她不喜欢他。

en: She may not like his attitude.
zh: 她可能不喜欢他的态度。

en: She is very anxious about his health.
She accepted his gift.
She immediately blushes in his presence.
She knew better than to smoke a cigarette in his presence.
zh: 她还没傻到在他面前抽烟。

en: She cherished his old love letters.
zh: 她珍藏着他以前的情书。

en: She turned around when she heard his voice.
zh: 她听到他的声音就转过身去。

en: She made believe not to hear him.
She pretended not to hear him.
She was very annoyed with his nerve.
zh: 她对他那股厚脸皮的劲儿烦透了。

en: She loves him for what he is, not for what he has.
zh: 她爱的是他这个人，而不是他的钱。

en: She was taken in by his gentlemanly appearance.
zh: 她被他那副文质彬彬的外表给骗了。

en: She accepted his offer.
She had the wind of his true intentions.
zh: 她察觉到了他的真实意图。

en: She sniffed out his true intentions, huh.
zh: 她识破了他的真实意图，是吧？

en: She got wind of his true intentions, huh.
zh: 她听到了风声，知道他的真实意图了，是吧？

en: She took up his offer.
She refused his offer.
She debated about his offer.
zh: 她在犹豫要不要接受他的提议。

en: She considered his offer carefully.
zh: 她认真考虑了他的提议。

en: She betrayed his trust.
She was completely taken in by his smile.
zh: 她完全被他的笑容给迷惑了。

en: She turned down his invitation.
She took care of his wound.
She will probably refuse to follow his advice, because she doesn't like him.
zh: 她大概不会听他的建议，因为她不喜欢他。

en: She was impatient to know his address.
zh: 她急着想知道他的地址。

en: She knew neither his address nor his phone number.
zh: 她既不知道他的地址，也不知道他的电话。

en: She wrapped her arms around his neck.
She stepped forward to shake his hand.
She tore his letter to pieces.
She took him by the arm.
She grabbed him by the hand.
She guaranteed his debts.
zh: 她为他的债务做了担保。

en: She is his real mother.
She shed crocodile tears over his death.
zh: 她为他的死掉了几滴鳄鱼眼泪。

en: She was disgusted at his persistence.
zh: 她对他那种死缠烂打感到很恶心。

en: She is happy to have conceived a baby by him.
zh: 她很高兴怀了他的孩子。

en: Though she looks like his older sister, the fact is that she is his mother.
zh: 虽然她看着像他姐姐，但实际上她是他妈。

en: She's not his sister, but his mother.
zh: 她不是他姐姐，而是他妈。

en: She treated him for a broken leg.
She treated his broken leg.
zh: 她处理了他的腿部骨折。

en: She gave him a necktie which was completely to his taste.
zh: 她送了他一条完全符合他品味的领带。

en: She took what he said as meaning agreement.
zh: 她把他的话理解成了同意。

en: She wrote down what he said.
She seems to have been offended by what he said.
zh: 她好像被他说的话给得罪了。

en: His words moved her to tears.
She made believe that she had not heard him.
zh: 她装作没听见他说话的样子。

en: She found it impossible to understand what he was saying.
zh: 她发现根本没法理解他在说什么。

en: She got what he said.
She knew better than to believe him.
zh: 她才不会傻到去相信他。

en: She closed her ears to what he was saying.
zh: 她对他说的那些话充耳不闻。

en: He has her under his thumb.
She is content with his present salary.
zh: 她对他现在的工资挺满意的。

en: She leaned against his shoulder.
She was anxious about his health.
zh: 她很担心他的身体状况。

en: She refused his proposal.
She turned down his proposal.
She yielded in his proposal.
zh: 她最终还是答应了他的求婚。

en: She accepted his hand in marriage.
She rebutted his argument.
She couldn't look him in the face.
She began to cry at the sight of his face.
zh: 她一看到他的脸就哭了起来。

en: She looked him in the face.
She slapped him in the face.
She slapped his face.
She caught sight of his face.
She smacked him across the face.
zh: 她狠狠地扇了他一记耳光。

en: She was beguiled by his sweet words.
zh: 她被他的甜言蜜语给骗了。

en: She married him for the sake of his family name.
zh: 她嫁给他是为了他的家世。

en: She rejected his offer of help.
She betrayed his hiding place to the police.
zh: 她向警察告发了他的藏身之处。

en: She was not provided for in his will.
zh: 他的遗嘱里没给她留东西。

en: She took over the will of him.
She inquired after him.
She is anxious about his safety.
She is worried about his safety.
She is concerned about his safety.
She didn't tolerate his selfishness.
She had no choice but to turn down his proposal.
zh: 她没办法，只好拒绝了他的求婚。

en: She is said to have refused his proposal.
zh: 据说她拒绝了他的求婚。

en: She spoke up for him.
She stood by him.
She thrilled to his saying so.
zh: 听他这么说，她激动坏了。

en: She accommodated her schedule to his.
zh: 她配合了他的时间安排。

en: She changed her schedule to match his.
zh: 她改了自己的日程来迁就他。

en: She ironed his shirts.
She went so far as to call him a fool.
She is very cross with him.
She cannot recommend him too much.
She knew him better than did all the others.
She was deeply offended by his remarks.
zh: 他的话深深地冒犯了她。

en: She became thin worrying about his matters.
zh: 她为了他的事操心，都瘦了。

en: She felt hurt at his words.
She will be a good companion for him.
She is likely to refuse to follow his advice, because she does not like him.
zh: 因为不喜欢他，她很可能会不听他的建议。

en: She borrowed his idea.
She has twice as many books as he has.
She is said to be in love with him.
It's said that she loves him.
They say that she is in love with him.
zh: 大家都说她正跟他谈恋爱。

en: She turned her head away, lest he should see her tears.
zh: 她把头转了过去，生怕被他看到自己的眼泪。

en: She turned her face away so he wouldn't see her tears.
zh: 她把脸转了过去，不想让他看见自己的眼泪。

en: She turned away for fear he see her tears.
zh: 她背过身去，生怕被他看见自己在流泪。

en: She gave him a tender kiss.
She cocked an eye at him.
She motioned me to hold my tongue.
She laid a blanket over him.
zh: 她给他盖上了一床毯子。

en: She gave him her name and telephone number.
zh: 她把自己的姓名和电话给了他。

en: She put him under a spell.
She reached against oppression.
She was unkind to him.
She informed him of her arrival.
She told her troubles to him.
zh: 她向他诉说了自己的烦恼。

en: She got so angry with him that she came very close to hitting him on the cheek.
zh: 她对他发了大火，差点一巴掌甩在他脸上。

en: She concealed the change in her feelings toward him.
zh: 她掩饰了自己对他感情的变化。

en: She filed a suit for divorce against him.
zh: 她向他提出了离婚起诉。

en: She testified against him.
She asked him to open the window.
She didn't let him touch her baby.
She wrote him a friendly letter, and thanked him for his help.
zh: 她给他写了一封友好的信，感谢他的帮助。

en: She thanked him with all her heart.
She gave him a tour of the new factory for me.
zh: 她替我带他参观了新工厂。

en: She gave him money as well as food.
zh: 她不仅给了他钱，还给了他吃的。

en: She advised him not to eat too much.
She encouraged him to write a novel.
She applied to him for help.
She asked him for help.
She pleaded with him not to disturb her.
She felt regret for having been rude to him.
zh: 她为自己对他没礼貌感到后悔。

en: She advised him to use a bicycle.
She gave him a watch.
She asked him to raise the funds.
She attended on him.
She is looking forward to seeing him again.
zh: 她正盼着能再次见到他呢。

en: She was looking forward to seeing him again.
zh: 她那时正盼着能再次见到他。

en: She asked him to sit down.
She advised him not to use too much sugar.
She talks to him as if he were a child.
zh: 她跟他说话就像在哄小孩似的。

en: She knows better than to answer back to him.
zh: 她还没傻到会去跟他顶嘴。

en: She retorted against him.
She handed out a key to him.
She handed him the key.
She loves him all the more because he has faults.
zh: 正因为他有缺点，她反而更爱他了。

en: She tried to keep away from him.
She threw a suspicious glance at him.
She hinted that she would like him to leave.
She got a false impression of him.
She felt happy to see him.
She begged him to send her home.
She didn't know what to say to him.
zh: 她不知道该跟他些说什么。

en: She whispered something into his ear.
zh: 她在他耳边小声说了些什么。

en: She read one poem to him.
She told him to keep away from bad friends.
zh: 她告诉他要远离那些狐朋狗友。

en: She is loved by him.
She did well by him.
She set him to chopping wood.
She bobbed at him.
She is all in all to him.
She is nothing to him.
zh: 她对他来说什么都不是。

en: She means nothing to him.
She lost to him in tennis.
She is hard on them.
He loved her very much.
She was loved very much by him.
She gave it to him.
She suggested that he try it.
She gave him the car.
She urged him to do the job.
She gave him the money.
She begged him not to go there.
She bought him a sweater.
She made a new suit for him.
zh: 她为他做了一套新西装。

en: She made him a new suit.
zh: 她给他做了一身新衣服。

en: She asked him to mail that letter.
She asked him to carry her bag.
She made a delicious meal for him.
zh: 她为他做了一顿好吃的。

en: She has done him many kindnesses.
When did she promise to meet him?
zh: 她答应什么时候跟他见面？

en: She met him three years ago.
She warned him not to go alone.
zh: 她提醒过他不要一个人去。

en: She had something to talk over with him.
She tried to make friends with him.
She is as intelligent as he.
She has broken with him.
She is reluctant to marry him.
I wonder if she will marry him.
zh: 我在想她会不会嫁给他。

en: She has been married to him for two years.
She married him.
She got married to him.
She is always ready to meet him halfway when she has an argument with him.
zh: 吵架的时候，她总是愿意跟他各退一步。

en: Did she come with him?
She went to the park with him.
She looks happiest when she is with him.
zh: 她跟他在一起的时候看着最幸福。

en: She told him once and for all that she would not go to the movies with him.
zh: 她明确告诉过他，她是绝不会跟他去看电影的。

en: She enjoyed talking with him.
She had no intention to quarrel with him.
She had no intention of quarreling with him.
zh: 她压根没打算跟他吵架。

en: She didn't plan on having a fight with him.
zh: 她本来没打算跟他大吵一顿。

en: She disapproved of him coming.
She cursed him for forgetting his promise.
zh: 她骂他忘了当初的诺言。

en: She cherishes the hope that he will return.
zh: 她一直抱着他会回来的希望。

en: She helped him in the belief that he was innocent.
zh: 她帮他是因为她觉得他是无辜的。

en: She presumes him to be innocent.
She declared him to be dishonest.
She was an excellent spouse who stood by him through poverty.
zh: 她是个好妻子，陪他度过了穷日子。

en: She said he was sick in bed, which was not true.
zh: 她说他病倒在床，其实根本不是那么回事。

en: She ignored the fact that he is ill.
zh: 她压根儿没理他生病的事。

en: She accused him of being inattentive to her.
zh: 她怪他对自己一点都不上心。

en: It had never occurred to her that he would be punished.
zh: 她压根儿没想到他会受罚。

en: She went into ecstasies about the ring he had bought her.
zh: 他给她买了个戒指，可把她高兴坏了。

en: She expects him to show up on Saturday afternoon.
zh: 她觉得他周六下午会过来。

en: She criticized him for being late.
zh: 她因为他迟到说了他一顿。

en: She was jealous when he talked to another girl.
zh: 只要他跟别的小姑娘说话，她就吃醋。

en: She was jealous from him talking to another girl.
zh: 他跟别的女孩说话，让她心里挺酸的。

en: When she saw the lengths he'd gone to to get all dressed up, she couldn't help letting a brief chuckle escape.
zh: 看到他费这么大劲打扮，她忍不住扑哧一声笑了。

en: She was satisfied that he was honest.
She told me his name after he had left.
zh: 他走了以后，她才告诉我他叫什么。

en: She thought he might be feeling lonely and forgotten.
zh: 她觉得他可能会感到孤独，觉得自己被遗忘了。

en: She accused him of stealing her car.
She said she feared that he might fail.
She seemed to take it for granted that he should go his own way.
zh: 她好像觉得他爱干嘛就干嘛是理所当然的。

en: She was afraid of his having an accident.
She stood by him whenever he was in trouble.
zh: 每次他遇到麻烦，她都会支持他。

en: She went on working till he called her.
zh: 她一直工作到他给我打电话。

en: She was surprised at his appearance.
zh: 看到他的样子，她吃了一惊。

en: She was surprised that he appeared.
zh: 她对他居然露面了感到很惊讶。

en: She was surprised that he showed up.
zh: 他居然来了，她感到很意外。

en: She made it clear that she didn't like him.
zh: 她明确表示自己不喜欢他。

en: She loved him all the better for his faults.
zh: 因为他的那些缺点，她反而更爱他了。

en: All she could do was watch him walk away.
zh: 她只能眼睁睁地看着他走远。

en: She wondered at the sudden change of his mind.
zh: 她纳闷他怎么突然变卦了。

en: She was impatient for him to return.
zh: 她等他回来等得都不耐烦了。

en: She doesn't seem to be able to catch on to what he is saying.
zh: 她好像还没明白他在说什么。

en: She got a present from her boyfriend.
zh: 她收到了男朋友送的礼物。

en: She was longing to hear from him.
She had no sooner read his letter than she tore it up.
zh: 她刚读完信就把它撕了。

en: She read his letter again and again.
zh: 他的信，她翻来覆去读了好几遍。

en: She ran her eyes over the letter from him.
zh: 她快速扫了一眼他写的信。

en: It made her jealous to see him walking with another girl.
zh: 看到他和别的女孩走在一起，她心里酸溜溜的。

en: She received the letter to the effect that he would soon be back.
zh: 她收到一封信，说是他很快就会回来。

en: She was thrilled with his presence.
She knows now that he is not to be counted on.
zh: 她现在知道了，他这人根本靠不住。

en: She applied for a job as a saleswoman.
She committed a crime.
She was only half alive.
She complained about the sentence.
Her hair style makes her look younger than her age.
zh: 这个发型让她看着比实际年龄小。

en: She is doing her hair simply.
She stood on the beach with her hair waving in the wind.
zh: 她站在海滩上，头发随风飘着。

en: She stood at the door, her hair blown by the wind.
zh: 她站在门口，头发被风吹得乱乱的。

en: She stood still with her hair flying in the wind.
zh: 她静静地站着，头发在风中飞舞。

en: She had her hair cut short.
She looks cute with her hair short.
zh: 她留短发看起来挺可爱的。

en: She wanted to have her hair cut, but her mother wouldn't let her.
zh: 她想去剪头发，但她妈妈不让。

en: She went to the hairdresser's to have her hair done.
She bound her hair with a ribbon.
She wears her hair in a bun.
She rubbed her hair with a towel.
She combed her hair and bound it with a ribbon.
zh: 她梳了梳头，然后用丝带扎了起来。

en: She keeps her hair in curls.
She is brushing her hair.
She watched the gardens grow, and she watched the apples turn red and ripen.
zh: 她看着花园里的植物生长，看着苹果变红成熟。

en: She didn't expose her skin to the sun.
She put the lid on the box.
She took off the lid of the box.
She has a large fortune to herself.
zh: 她独自拥有一大笔财产。

en: She is as beautiful as Snow White.
zh: 她像白雪公主一样漂亮。

en: She is in good circumstances with a large fortune.
zh: 她家境很好，有一大笔财富。

en: She sat just behind the seats for whites, and then refused to give up her seat to a white passenger who got on the bus after her.
zh: 她就坐在白人专座后面，后来拒绝给一个在她之后上车的白人乘客让座。

en: She's of the Caucasian race.
She's Caucasian.
She handed in a blank test.
She is attractive when she is dressed in white.
zh: 她穿白衣服的时候很有魅力。

en: She had a white book under her arm.
zh: 她腋下夹着一本白色的书。

en: She is dressed in white.
She had white shoes on.
She embroidered her initials on a white handkerchief.
zh: 她在白手帕上绣了她名字的首字母。

en: She embroidered her own initials on the white handkerchief.
zh: 她在那个白手帕上绣了自己的名字首字母。

en: She wore a white dress.
She dyed her white skirt red.
zh: 她把白裙子染成了红色。

en: She went by cab to the museum.
She went to the museum by cab.
She went to the museum by taxi.
zh: 她坐出租车去了博物馆。

en: She took the taxi to the museum.
zh: 她打出租车去了博物馆。

en: She received a doctor's degree.
She concealed the fact that she used to be a salesgirl.
zh: 她隐瞒了自己以前当过店员的事实。

en: She may have gone out to do some shopping.
Whenever she goes shopping, she ends up buying more than she can afford.
zh: 她每次去买东西，最后买的都超出她的经济能力。

en: She went shopping.
She is all for going shopping.
She has gone shopping.
She is carrying a backpack on her back.
She wears high heels to make herself look taller.
zh: 她穿高跟鞋是为了让自己显高点。

en: She seemed surprised to hear her name called from behind.
zh: 听到有人在后面叫她的名字，她似乎吃了一惊。

en: She was a tall, thin girl with long, soft brown hair.
zh: 她是个身材修长的女孩，留着一头柔软的棕色长发。

en: She was too short to see over the fence.
zh: 她太矮了，看不见围栏那边。

en: She's too short to reach the top.
She is growing tall.
She was a tall, slender blonde.
zh: 她是个身材高挑苗条的金发女郎。

en: She is not tall.
She had a picture taken with an actor.
She seemed so much at ease in the saddle.
zh: 她在马背上显得特别自在。

en: She is far from a fool.
She got rattled by the stupid question.
zh: 她被那个蠢问题给问懵了。

en: She is a temp.
She would have liked to peep in, but could not do such a thing.
zh: 她挺想往里偷看一眼的，但她做不出那种事。

en: She looks like a farmer's wife.
She was wearing dark brown shoes.
She wore a dark blue scarf.
zh: 她戴着一条深蓝色的围巾。

en: She looked at me seductively.
She takes care of her old mother.
zh: 她在照顾她年迈的母亲。

en: She is lying about her age.
She has to live on the pension.
zh: 她得靠领养老金过日子。

en: She is getting on.
She was weary with age.
zh: 她因为年纪大了，显得很疲惫。

en: She tried to look much younger than she really was.
zh: 她想让自己看起来比实际年龄小很多。

en: She looks young for her age.
She was wonderfully alive for her age.
zh: 就她这个年纪来说，她真是精神头十足。

en: She studies hard.
She was eager to feed the birds.
She entered into conversation with zeal.
zh: 她兴致勃勃地聊了起来。

en: She played the piano with enthusiasm.
zh: 她弹钢琴弹得特别起劲。

en: She was burning with fever.
She is in bed with a fever.
She enjoys soaking herself in a hot bath.
She has two cats. One is black, and the other is white.
zh: 她养了两只猫，一只是黑的，另一只是白的。

en: She has a cat. The cat is white.
zh: 她养了一只猫，是白色的。

en: She wants to keep a cat.
She scared the cat away.
As she feels deep sorrow at her cat's death, let her be.
zh: 她因为猫死了特别难过，就让她一个人待会儿吧。

en: She had an abortion.
She is expecting a child.
She's pregnant.
She is great with child.
She is eight months pregnant.
She stopped smoking on account of health concerns for her pregnancy.
zh: 为了孕期健康，她把烟戒了。

en: She is constantly in and out of hospital.
She achieved the goal of winning the prize.
She was nervous before the entrance exam.
She was anxious to know the entrance exam results.
zh: 她急着想知道考试结果。

en: She made out the application for admission.
She expected to have called on her mother in hospital.
zh: 她本打算去医院看她妈妈的。

en: I think she was planning to go visit her mother in the hospital.
zh: 我觉得她当时正打算去医院看她妈妈。

en: I think she was planning to go visit her mother who is in the hospital.
zh: 我觉得她当时打算去医院看她住院的妈妈。

en: She has been mending since she entered the hospital.
zh: 自从住院以后，她的身体一直在好转。

en: She saw a young man at the entrance.
zh: 她在门口看见了一个年轻人。

en: She closed the door tightly behind her.
zh: 她随手紧紧地关上了门。

en: She visited the old man in the hospital every day but Sunday.
zh: 除了周日，她每天都去医院看望那位老人。

en: She gets up late on Sunday mornings.
She makes a point of going to church on Sundays.
zh: 她周日雷打不动地要去教堂。

en: She used to go to the movies on Sundays.
zh: 她以前常在周日去看电影。

en: She rarely goes out on Sundays.
She did not visit me on Sunday but on Monday.
zh: 她不是周日来看我的，是周一来的。

en: She used to go to the museum on Sundays.
zh: 她以前周日常去博物馆。

en: She will be the first Japanese woman astronaut.
zh: 她将成为日本第一位女宇航员。

en: She came to Japan for the purpose of studying Japanese.
zh: 她来日本是为了学日语。

en: She came to Japan to study Japanese.
She spoke Japanese well.
She could only take Japanese lessons for a few hours.
zh: 她每天只能上几个小时的日语课。

en: She can speak Japanese.
She traveled round Japan.
She traveled around Japan.
She left Japan, never to return home again.
zh: 她离开了日本，再也没回过家。

en: She is familiar with Japanese history.
While in Japan, she bought the camera.
zh: 她在日本的时候买了那个相机。

en: She bought that camera while she was in Japan.
zh: 那台相机是她在日本的时候买的。

en: While she was staying in Japan, she often visited Kyoto.
zh: 她在日本住的那阵子经常去京都。

en: It is not too much to say that she is one of the best tennis players in Japan.
zh: 说她是日本最好的网球选手之一也不为过。

en: She has a good command of English though she was brought up in Japan.
zh: 虽然她是在日本长大的，但英语说得很溜。

en: She is well known both in Japan and in America.
zh: 她在日本和美国都很有名。

en: She is well known both in Japan and in the United States.
zh: 她在日本和美国都挺出名的。

en: She wrote the date in numeric form.
She wanted to get away from everyday life.
The sun has bronzed her skin.
zh: 她的皮肤被太阳晒成了古铜色。

en: She put on dark glasses to protect her eyes from the sun.
zh: 她戴上墨镜是为了保护眼睛不被阳光晒到。

en: She decided to keep a diary.
She got up early so as to see the sunrise.
zh: 她为了看日出特意起得很早。

en: She is in low spirits today.
She lost one of her flesh and blood.
She is getting better day by day.
zh: 她一天比一天好起来了。

en: I vowed that I would never speak to her again.
zh: 我发誓再也不跟她说话了。

en: She pledged herself never to do it again.
zh: 她保证再也不那么做了。

en: She has two thousand books.
She brought up two children.
She gave birth to her first child at twenty years old.
zh: 她二十岁生了第一个孩子。

en: She has just turned twelve.
She said she was twenty years old, which was not true.
zh: 她说她二十岁，其实是骗人的。

en: She will cope with difficult problems.
zh: 她会处理那些棘手的问题。

en: She made up a parcel of old clothes for the refugees.
zh: 她给难民打包了一些旧衣服。

en: She has perfected the art of handling difficult customers.
zh: 她处理难缠的顾客非常有手腕。

en: She must be from the South.
She comes from the South, as I knew from her accent.
zh: 听口音，我就知道她是南方人。

en: She told me the story in confidence.
zh: 她私下里把这事告诉了我。

en: She is pigeon-toed.
She seems shy, but has a strong will in practice.
zh: 她看着挺害羞的，其实骨子里挺要强的。

en: She seems reserved, but she's actually a strong-willed person.
zh: 她看起来挺文静的，其实很有主见。

en: She seems timid, but she's actually a strong-willed person.
zh: 她看着胆子小，其实性格挺刚毅的。

en: She shows a shy disposition.
She is shy and always remains in the background.
zh: 她很怕生，总是躲在后面。

en: I like her all the better for her shyness.
zh: 我反而因为她的害羞而更喜欢她了。

en: She went inside.
Suddenly, she stopped and looked around.
zh: 她突然停了下来，四处看了看。

en: She fell silent suddenly.
She suddenly fell silent.
She burst into anger.
She turned around suddenly.
All of a sudden, she began to laugh.
She burst into tears.
She burst out crying.
Suddenly she had a brilliant inspiration.
zh: 她突然有了个绝妙的灵感。

en: She found pleasure in reading.
She indulged herself in reading.
She has a taste for reading.
She likes to read.
She teaches reading and writing.
She is a self-educated woman.
She went to the movies by herself.
She stayed here by herself.
She wears heavy makeup.
She has a sharp tongue.
She killed herself by taking poison.
She committed suicide by taking poison.
She was studying drama on a special scholarship.
zh: 她拿着专项奖学金在学戏剧。

en: She has a special way of making bread.
She is endowed with a special talent.
She slipped in crossing the road.
zh: 她过马路的时候滑了一跤。

en: She was on the point of laughing at the clown's actions.
zh: 看到小丑的动作，她差点没笑出来。

en: When she got lost, she wished she had followed his advice.
zh: 她迷路的时候，真后悔没听他的建议。

en: I am afraid she may have lost her way.
She lost her way.
She lost her way and on top of that it began to rain.
zh: 她迷路了，而且偏偏还下起雨来。

en: She cut me dead in the street.
zh: 她在街上见了我故意装作没看见。

en: She ignored me even when she met me on the street.
zh: 她在街上碰见我连招呼都不打。

en: She is well spoken of among her own sex.
zh: 她在同性圈子里口碑很好。

en: She may or may not agree with us.
She keeps on making the same mistakes.
She made the same mistake again.
She gave up eating meat after reading a book about cruelty to animals.
zh: 看了那本讲虐待动物的书后，她就不再吃肉了。

en: She kept on writing stories about animals.
zh: 她一直在写关于动物的故事。

en: She spoke out strongly against cruelty to animals.
She is gentle to animals.
She wrote a book about animals.
zh: 她写了一本关于动物的书。

en: She went on working.
She kept on working.
She kept working.
She's always on the go.
She's tired from overwork.
She complains of headaches, and that very often.
zh: 她老说头疼，而且还挺频繁的。

en: She complained of a headache.
She complained of her headache.
She laid her head down on the pillow.
